feature.name: MFCC: Spectral Rolloff Point
feature.description: The fraction of bins in the power spectrum at which 85% of the power is at lower frequencies. This is a measure of the right-skewedness of the power spectrum. MFCC of each dimension of this feature

feature.name: MFCC: Spectral Flux
feature.description: A measure of the amount of spectral change in a signal. Found by calculating the change in the magnitude spectrum from frame to frame. MFCC of each dimension of this feature

feature.name: MFCC: Zero Crossings
feature.description: The number of times the waveform changed sign. An indication of frequency as well as noisiness. MFCC of each dimension of this feature

feature.name: MFCC: Beat Sum
feature.description: The sum of all entries in the beat histogram. This is a good measure of the importance of regular beats in a signal. MFCC of each dimension of this feature

feature.name: MFCC: Strongest Frequency Via Zero Crossings
feature.description: The strongest frequency component of a signal, in Hz, found via the number of zero-crossings. MFCC of each dimension of this feature

feature.name: MFCC: MFCC
feature.description: MFCC calculations based upon Orange Cow code MFCC of each dimension of this feature
